content.question: After 1863, which of the following most fulfilled the “new birth of freedom” that the excerpt refers to?

choices.label: Ratification of the Thirteenth, Fourteenth, and Fifteenth Amendments
The compromise that resolved the election of 1876
Establishment of the Ku Klux Klan and similar organizations
Supreme Court rulings such as Plessy v. Ferguson

content.answer: Ratification of the Thirteenth, Fourteenth, and Fifteenth Amendments

topic.text: 5.9: Government Policies During the Civil War

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
